Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
I hope you have had an awesome week and that you are getting ready for a fun-filled weekend!
This is just a reminder for the following:
Payment Deadline:
There is one week left to fundraise for your trip so share your Canada Helps page and finish off all of your fundraising plans.
$300 deposit should already be on your page to secure your spot $2,495 is due March 1, 2014
Booking your flights:
Airport: Chiang Mai, Thailand - Airport Code:CNX Arrival: April 29, 2014 Departure: May 11, 2014
Forwarding your itinerary:
Once you have booked your flights, please forward me the original flight itinerary that your airlines sent you.
Travel Insurance:
Please provide me with the following: Insurance Provider Policy # Phone number (toll free) Phone number (collect call)
Thank you!
Sincerely,
Joy Yu
